citation.article-title: Demequina aestuarii gen. nov., sp. nov., a novel actinomycete of the suborder Micrococcineae, and reclassification of Cellulomonas fermentans Bagnara et al. 1985 as Actinotalea fermentans gen. nov., comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Actinotalea fermentans sp. nov., comb. nov.
Actinotalea fermentans (fer.men′tans. L. part. adj. fermentans fermenting).
Basonym: Cellulomonas fermentans Bagnara et al. 1985.
The description is identical to that given for Cellulomonas fermentans by Bagnara et al. (1985).
Cell wall sugars are glucose, rhamnose and ribose.
The DNA G+C content of the type strain is 76 mol%.
